Description.Content: Support for defining custom styles and extending existing styles.
This must be the root node.
Defines a single style. Contains 'item' elements.
A name for the style, which is used as the resource ID to apply the style to a View, Activity, or application.
Reference to a style from which this style should inherit style properties.
Defines a single property for the style. Must be a child of a 'style' element.
The name of the style property to be defined, with a package prefix if necessary (for example android:textColor).
